[Amatsu Travel Brochure] The people of Amatsu carry themselves with honor and tranquility. While visiting the city, make sure to see: 1. The beautiful Water Shrine. 2. The Lord of Amatsu, who is much more open than rulers of other lands and will talk to visitors and citizens alike. 3. The Legendary Tree, that holds many legends. It is said, that when you propose under its branches your marriage will be blessed. 4. The Coy Pond, located in the wonderful gardens, whose careful balance and flow reflect the keeper's state of mind.

[Ayothaya Travel Brochure] Transcend your limitations, and find life's perfect philosophy is Ayothaya's Heritage. While visiting the city, make sure to see: 1. The Reclining Philosopher Statues, that symbolise Ayothaya's great Philosophers that all Ayothayans seek to emulate. 2. The Shrine in Ayothaya and meditate upon your life's journey. Keep the balance of your mind and body. 3. The Tom Yum Goong Restaurant where the famous and truly delicious soup will refuel your body. Don't leave Ayothaya without sampling the dishes there.

[Gonryun Travel Brochure] Gonryun is a land in the clouds. Being so high in the air affords an unprecedented view of the world and gives a different mindset to those who allow themselves to think freely. While visiting the city, make sure to see: 1. The Statue of Gonryun's Greatest Philosopher, that stands proudly in the middle of town, ready to inspire great thoughts from all those that gaze upon him. 2. The Overlook of the World. There are particular spots that are exceptionally breathtaking, so please watch your step. 3. The small hill in Gonryun that is said to have been the Great Philosophers favorite meditation spot. See if any grand thoughts take you. 4. The Mini-town on ground beneath Gonryun that is a lesson against stagnant and small thinking.

[Louyang Travel Brochure] Louyang is a spiritual country, where the warrior spirit and clear thinking are highly prized. While visiting the city, make sure to see: 1. Such wondrous sites such as the Statue of the Man and the Tiger, that may inspire you to do your best. 2. The Hospital, where the Louyang healers practice their art. There, your body will be cured by a system of body manipulations and diet. 3. The beautiful Palace that is protected by the Great Wall of Louyang. It is truly a sight to behold for every visitor. 4. The Tower where people practice there lungs by shouting from it. Something to relax after a hard day of martial arts and spirit training.
